main.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
main.subHeading: Find answers to the most common questions about Kartavya and its initiatives
main.description: We've compiled a list of frequently asked questions to help you better understand our organization and its initiatives. If your query isn't addressed here, please feel free to contact us.

contactCard.heading: Still Have Questions?
contactCard.description: If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Our team is here to help you with any queries you may have.

faqs.question: How can I support Kartavya?
faqs.answer: You can support Kartavya through donations, volunteering, or by spreading awareness about our initiatives. Visit our donation page to contribute financially.

faqs.question: What is the child sponsorship program?
faqs.answer: Our child sponsorship program provides educational support to underprivileged children. The sponsorship amount of â‚¹8,000 covers educational expenses for one year.

faqs.question: Can I volunteer at Kartavya?
faqs.answer: Yes, Absolutely! Kartavya thrives because of the dedication and passion of its volunteers, who contribute selflessly to our cause. IIT ISM Students can join as regular volunteers, while individuals from outside the institute are invited to participate in specific events and initiatives. Every effort counts, and your involvement can truly make a difference.

faqs.question: Are my donations tax-deductible?
faqs.answer: Yes, all donations made to Kartavya are eligible for tax deductions under Section 80G of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Donors will receive a receipt for claiming the deduction.

faqs.question: How are the donations utilized?
faqs.answer: Donations are primarily allocated to educational programs, health initiatives, and community development projects. Kartavya is committed to maintaining complete transparency in the utilization of funds, ensuring every contribution is used effectively to create meaningful impact.
